H0.text: Who wrote the play ‘The Iceman Cometh’. Eugene O'Neill

H1.text: Who wrote the play ‘The Iceman Cometh’. Tennessee Williams

H2.text: Who wrote the play ‘The Iceman Cometh’. Arthur Miller

H3.text: Who wrote the play ‘The Iceman Cometh’. SS Glencairn

A4.text: After a ten-year pause, O'Neill's now renowned play The Iceman Cometh was produced in 1946.

A5.text: As his health worsened, O'Neill lost inspiration for the project and wrote three largely autobiographical plays, The Iceman Cometh, Long Day's Journey into Night, and A Moon for the Misbegotten, which he completed in 1943, just before leaving Tao House and losing his ability to write.
